sections.heading: advocate; ex parte communications
sections.text: In any proceeding before the commission in which the public advocate is a party or is appearing for a party, the public advocate shall be considered a party for purposes of the restrictions on ex parte communications set forth in sections 75-130.01 and 84-914.Source

66-1835.Public advocate; ex parte communications.

In any proceeding before the commission in which the public advocate is a party or is appearing for a party, the public advocate shall be considered a party for purposes of the restrictions on ex parte communications set forth in sections 75-130.01 and 84-914.

SourceLaws 2003, LB 790, ยง 35.
